meanings.definition: Engaging in casual conversation or small talk, especially for networking purposes.
meanings.sent1: During the event, she was schmoosing with various guests to make connections.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone was schmoosing and getting to know each other.
meanings.sent3: While schmoosing with the CEO, he accidentally spilled his drink on her shoes.
meanings.sent4: She was a master at schmoosing, effortlessly weaving through conversations like a skilled dancer.
meanings.sent5: The art of schmoosing can open many doors in the business world.

meanings.definition: To socialize or mingle in a friendly and informal manner.
meanings.sent1: Neighbors often schmoose over the fence on sunny afternoons.
meanings.sent2: After work, colleagues enjoy schmoosing at the local bar.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be schmoosing with the dog in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Schmoosing through the crowd, she found herself in the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: Schmoosing is a great way to build relationships in a relaxed setting.
